content.html: People saying fired Twitter employees must not have mattered bc Twitter hasn't disappeared have same energy as the "How can climate change be real if it snowed today!?" people. Site is getting worse--more spam, tweets not loading, etc.--but it's not going to implode instantly
content.value:
People saying fired Twitter employees must not have mattered bc Twitter hasn't disappeared have same energy as the "How can climate change be real if it snowed today!?" people. 

Site is getting worse--more spam, tweets not loading, etc.--but it's not going to implode instantly
